children.note: The First online Quiz is available for testing, and is very good to revise. Answers are shown at the end. Link: https://forms.gle/7JwAKaWM1ja8oCNMA

children.name: note2 - 21.txt
children.note: "Final revision MCQs" is a collection of questions from online websites. Some questions may  be answered wrong, and some may be out of our course. But multiple questions in exams came from them.

children.note: Special thanks for Note Writers of 2021 for their effort. Your effort is highly appreciated and we thank you deeply even if we don't know who you are.

children.name: note.txt
children.note: Due to the lack of Booklets, we can study by revising the Lecture Notes/Tutorials and solving their examples, and by solving the Sheets again. Sheet solutions are present. If any booklets are made, kindly contact me on Facebook to add them.

children.name: note.txt
children.note: Sheets of 2021 are the same as 2020. However, sheets of 2019 are different. Solutions for both are provided.
